resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106834</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106834</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">American Memory: North Carolina educator's guide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanischer Speicher: Anleitung des 
Nord-Carolina Erziehers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mémoire Américaine : Le guide du nord de
l'éducateur de la Caroline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Memória Americana: Guia do educador de 
North.carolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Memoria Americana: Guida dell'educatore del 
North.carolina</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμερικανική μνήμη: Οδηγός του εκπαιδευτικού της 
βόρειας Καρολίνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Memoria Americana: Guía del educador de 
Carolina del Norte</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Each month during 2007, LEARN NC will feature an in-depth look at one aspect of the Library of Congress' American Memory with a special focus on North Carolina materials.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jeder Monat während 2007, ERLERNEN, DASS NC einen 
eingehenden Blick bei einem Aspekt der Bibliothek des amerikanischen 
Speichers der Kongresse mit einem speziellen Fokus auf Nord-Carolina 
Materialien kennzeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chaque mois pendant 2007, APPRENNENT que L'OR 
comportera un regard détaillé à un aspect de la bibliothèque de la
mémoire américaine des congrès avec un foyer spécial sur les 
matériaux du nord de la Caroline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cada mês durante 2007, APRENDE que O NC 
caracterizará um olhar in-depth em um aspecto da biblioteca da 
memória americana dos congress' com um foco especial em materiais de 
North.carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ogni mese durante il 2007, IMPARA che IL NC 
caratterizzerà uno sguardo approfondito ad una funzione della 
libreria della memoria americana dei congressi con un fuoco speciale 
sui materiali del North.carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάθε μήνας κατά τη διάρκεια του 2007, ΜΑΘΑΙΝΕΙ ότι
NC θα χαρακτηρίσει ένα σε βάθος βλέμμα σε μια πτυχή της 
αμερικανικής μνήμης βιβλιοθήκης των συνεδρίων με μια ειδική 
εστίαση στα υλικά της βόρειας Καρολίνας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cada mes durante 2007, APRENDE que EL NC ofrecerá 
una mirada profundizada en un aspecto de la biblioteca de la memoria 
americana de los congresos con un foco especial en los materiales de 
Carolina del Norte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106834</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/american-memory-north-carolina-educators-guide</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
